snippet: The state-controlled news agency directed racist and suggestive language toward President Obama and President Park Geun-hye of South Korea, who together recently issued stern warnings to North Korea.
abstract: North Korea's state-run Korean Central News Agency directs racist and suggestive language toward Pres Obama and South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye, who together have issued stern warnings to North Korea.
lead_paragraph: The state-controlled news agency directed racist and suggestive language toward President Obama and President Park Geun-hye of South Korea, who together recently issued stern warnings to North Korea.
